name: Assemble the Team
text: Uses (0 Bonds). Limit 1 per investigator. Attached asset does not take up an Ally slot. [reaction] When you would play an Ally asset and Assemble the Team is not attached to a card, if that Ally costs less than the number of bonds on this card: Spend all the bonds on Assemble the Team, reduce the cost of that Ally to 0, and attach this card to it. [reaction] After an Ally card enters play at your location: Place 1 resource on Assemble the Team as a bond.

name: Beseeching Prayer
text:
[reaction] After a skill test at your location ends, if an [eldersign] was revealed during that test and Beseeching Prayer is unexhausted: Seal ([eldersign]).

[reaction] When a chaos token would be revealed from the chaos bag during a skill test, exhaust Beseeching Prayer: Resolve the token sealed here, as if it were just revealed from the chaos bag. Then reveal another token.

name: Discarded Dogtags
text: [reaction] After you take 1 or more damage, exhaust Discarded Dogtags and take 1 damage: Gain 1 resource and heal 1 horror.

name: Close Quarters
text: Fight. Add your [agility] value - 1 to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed, this attack deals an additional +1 damage.

name: Distribute Supplies
text:
Each investigator may choose 1 of the following options:
-  Spend 2 resources. Then, another investigator gains 3 resources.

-  Discard a card. Then, another investigator draws 1 card.

-  Discard 1 asset you control. Then, another investigator plays an asset. Reduce it's cost by 1.

name: Good Cap, Bad Cop
text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and test [combat] (3) or [intellect] (4). If you succeed and that enemy is Humanoid, discover 2 clues at your location. If they aren't and/or you fail, deal 1 damage to that enemy.

name: Absolute Focus
text: You get +1 [willpower], +1 [intellect], +1 [combat], and +1 [agility] during this skill test.

name: Insult
text: Fast. Choose a non-Elite enemy at your location with damage on it. Attach Insult to that enemy and move 1 damage on it to this card. [reaction] After the attached enemy is defeated: Draw 1 card and gain 2 resources.

name: Lie in Wait
text: [free] During the enemy phase, take an action as if it was your turn (this does count toward the number of actions you can take each turn and can provoke attacks of opportunity).

name: Rushed to the scene
text: Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. [reaction] Before you draw your opening hand: Search your deck for a Firearm asset with Uses (X ammo). Play it, reducing it's cost by 2, with 0 ammo on it. Shuffle your deck.

name: Good Cap, Bad Cop
text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and test [combat] (3) or [intellect] (4). If you succeed and that enemy is Humanoid, discover 2 clues at your location. If they aren't and/or you fail, deal 2 damage to that enemy.

name: "I'm too old for this sh..."
text: If you succeed this test, heal 1 horror and draw a card. If you fail, heal 2 horror instead.

name: Security Guard
text: Uses (1 supply). You get +1 [combat]. [reaction] After you spend at least 1 ammo, exhaust Security Guard: Place 1 supply on Security Guard. [free] Spend 3 supplies: Automatically evade a non-Elite enemy at your location.

name: Hunt them Down
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn. Max once per round.
You may take an additional 4 actions this turn. At the beginning of next round, you lose 3 - X actions, where X is the number of actions you chose to not take last round (minimum 0).

name: Insult
text:
Fast..
Choose an enemy at your location with damage on it. Attach Insult to that enemy and move up to 3 damage on it to this card.

[reaction] When the attached enemy attacks Insult's owner: It deals 1 less horror for this attack..

[reaction] After the attached enemy is defeated: Draw 2 cards. Gain 2 resources for each damage on Insult.

name: "I'm Gonna Need a Bigger Gun."
text: You can only commit this card to a Fight test you are performing on a Firearm asset. If you succeed, move all the ammo from that Firearm to this card. Discard that card and play a Firearm asset from you hand, reducing it's cost by the cost of the card you discarded. Move all ammo from this card to the played Firearm.

name: Dave Reacher
text:
Handlocked.
While the leftmost card in your hand is an event card: You get +1 [intellect]. Otherwise, you get +1 [willpower].

[free] Exhaust Dave Reacher: You may discard the leftmost card in your hand and draw a card. Otherwise, move that card to the rightmost position of your hand.

name: Laboratory Coat
text:
Handlocked.

Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
[free] During a skill test you can commit to, exhaust Laboratory Coat: The current leftmost card in your hand gains a [wild] icon during this test.

name: "Do as I do."
text: Fast. Play only after making a skill test as your first action. Choose another investigator at your location. They take an action of the same type as your first action. This action does not count toward the number of actions they can take each turn. If they succeed a skill test, lose 1 action and you both gain 2 resources (types include activate, evade, fight, and investigate).

flavor:
"My head! Daisy was right.
This was a terrible idea."
name: Eldritch Research
text: Take 1 horror. Discard the top 6 card of your deck. Add up to 2 Insight cards discarded this way to your hand. Shuffle each weakness that was discarded by this effect back into your deck.

name: Following the Trail
text: Handlocked. While this card is in the right half of your hand, it gains fast. Investigate. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this investigation. If you succeed, you may move to a connecting location and discover a clue there, instead of discovering a clue at your current location.

name: Glint From Afar
text: Handlocked. Glint From Afar cannot be played. Forced Whenever Glint From Afar is the leftmost card in your hand: Draw a card. Then, shuffle Glint From Afar into your deck. [reaction] After you take a Move action: Discard this card and move an investigator at a connecting location to your location or visa versa.

name: Rampant Search
text: Investigate. Add your [combat] value - 1 to your skill value for this investigation. If you succeed, you discover 1 additional clue at your location.

name: Snooping Around
text:
Fast. Play only at the start of the mythos phase.
Search the top 9 cards of the encounter deck for an enemy, spawn it engaged with you, attach Snooping Around to it, and shuffle the encounter deck.

[reaction] When an investigator defeats an enemy with Snooping Around attached to it: They discover 1 clue at their location. Heal 1 horror.

name: Mysterious Ledgers
text: Handlocked. Investigate. You get +1 [intellect] for this investigation (+3 [intellect] if you have 2 or more Insight cards in your hand). If you succeed, you may move a card in your hand to any position. Then, play an Insight card from you hand.

flavor: "I just need to beat them at their own game. Easy."
name: Sinister Challenge
text: Reduce the cost to play Sinister Challenge by 1 for every 4 cards in your hand. Investigate. Investigate with a base [intellect] value of 1. (If you have 8 or more cards in your hand, this test is automatically successful.) If you succeed, discover 2 total clues from among your location and connecting locations.

name: Seeing the Big Picture
text: Exceptional. Handlocked. Forced At the end of the round, move Seeing the Big Picture 1 position to the left. While it is the the leftmost card in your hand, it cannot change position and you must commit it to the next eligible skill test you perform. While Seeing the Big Picture is in your hand, reduce the cost of Insight cards you play by 1.

name: Heather Freeman
text:
While you have at least 7 cards in hand you gain
+1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you discard a card from your hand or deck, exhaust Heather Freeman: Draw a card. You may discard the card you drew. If you do, draw a card.

name: Shroud of the Old Ones
text: [reaction] When an enemy would spawn at your location, exhaust Shroud of the Old Ones: Choose a connecting location with at least 1 clue on it. Then, test [intellect] (4). If you succeed, spawn that enemy at the chosen location instead, if able.

name: Timelocked
text: Exceptional. During the upkeep phase, you may choose to not draw a card. While you have no cards in your deck, you get +1 [willpower] , +1 [intellect], +1 [combat], +1 [agility] and may take an additional action during your turn. [reaction] After this card enters play: Discard your hand and draw 5 cards. Forced Cards that would shuffle into your deck are removed from the game, instead.

name: Bookkeeping
text:
If in your discard, there are at least...

- ...5 cards, you may draw a card.

- ...10 cards, your location gets -1 shroud until the end of this round. 

- ...15 cards, discover 2 clues at your location.

- ...20 cards, discover 1 clue at any location.


You may shuffle your discard into your deck.

name: Tome of Memories
text: You get +1 skill value while resolving skill tests on event cards. Forced At the start of your turn, add an Insight card from your discard to your hand. At the end of your turn, remove that card from the game.

name: Inner Lining
text:
Handlocked. Uses (3 supplies).
[reaction] When you play the card in the middle position of your hand, spend 1 supply and exhaust Inner Lining: Place 1 supply or ammo on another asset card you control.

name: Oddly Shaped Key
text: Fast. Limit 1 per deck. [action] Investigate. If a +1, +0, or [eldersign] token is revealed during this test, attach Oddly Shaped Key to this location. Otherwise, return this card to your hand. (Max 1 test per location) Attached location gains: "The owner of this card automatically succeeds basic investigate tests at this location."

name: Stacked Deck
text:
Uses (0 supplies). Limit 10 supplies on Stacked Deck.
[reaction] After you spend resources to play a card: Place 1 supply on this card.

[action] Discard Stacked Deck: Move all supplies from it to your resource pool, as resources.

name: Discarded Evidence
text:
If you have an odd number of cards after playing Discarded Evidence, gain 2 resources and draw a card.

If you have an even number of cards after playing Discarded Evidence, gain 3 resources, you may discard a card to draw a card.

name: "Let Me See That!"
text: Use a [action] ability on an Item asset controlled by another investigator at your location, as if that asset was under your control. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: The First to Flinch
text: Group limit 1 copy of The First to Flinch in play. Fast. Play after you draw a non-weakness treachery card, but before resolving that card's effects. Put The First to Flinch into play in your play area and attach that encounter card to it instead of resolving it. Forced After an investigator fails a skill test on an encounter card, they draw the attached card. Then, discard The First to Flinch.

name: Unstable Terrain
text: Evade. Add your [willpower] value - 1 to your skill value for this evade. If you succeed, you deal the evaded enemy 1 damage.

name: "Who's counting?"
text: Fight. Perform a Fight action using a Weapon asset you control with no ammo remaining, as if it had 1 ammo. If you succeed, place 1 ammo on the Weapon asset used. Otherwise, discard the Weapon asset and the enemy immediately attacks you.

name: Working the Angles
text:
Handlocked.
While commiting Working the Angles, if it was in
your hand's...

  - ...right half, Working the Angles gains a [willpower] icon.

  - ...left half, Working the Angles gains a [agility] icon.

  - ...middle position, Working the Angles gains "If this test is successful, draw 1 card."

name: Flawless Execution
text: If you commit this card to a skill test on an event card you played and you succeed: Gain X resources, where X is the cost of the event card when you played it.

name: Klabb
text: Handlocked. Uses (3 ammo). If Klabb was the leftmost card in your hand when playing it: Place 3 additional ammo on this card. [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this attack and you deal +1 damage. If you do not succeed by at least 1, remove 1 ammo from Klabb .

name: Platinum Club
text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack for every 3 resources in your resource pool (Limit +5 [combat]). As an additional cost to initiate this ability, you may exhaust Platinum Club. If you do, you deal +1 damage for this attack.

name: Stacked Deck
text:
Uses (2 supplies). Limit 15 supplies on Stacked Deck.
[reaction] After you spend resources to play a card: Place 1 resource on this card. (Limit 15 resources)

[free] Discard Stacked Deck: Move all supplies from it to your resource pool, as resources.

name: Deal Closer
text: Handlocked. Fight. This attack deals +1 damage. If before playing Deal Closer, right of it was at least... - ...2 cards, Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this attack. - ...4 cards, this attack deals an additional +2 damage.

name: Royal Flush
text:
Handlocked. Fast. Royal Flush can only be played while it is the leftmost card in your hand.
Gain 2 resources, draw 2 cards, and you may take an additional 2 actions on your turn. Remove Royal Flush from the game.

name: Underworld Couriers
text:
Handlocked.
You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [agility].

At the start of each round, the cards currently in the leftmost and middle position of your hand become the "Package", until either they are played or the round ends.

[reaction] After you play a Package card: Gain 1 resource. You may exhaust Underworld Couriers to draw 1 card.

name: Celestial Inscriptions
text:
Uses (5 Charges)
[reaction] When a token with a non-negative modifier is revealed during a skill test at your location, spend 1 charge: Increase that token's modifier by +2 for this test.

name: Rending
text: Uses (2 charges). If Rending has no charges, discard it or spend 1 resource to return it to your hand. [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat] and deals +1 damage. If you fail, remove 1 charge from Rending.

name: Trace Scrying
text: Uses (2 charges). If Trace Scrying has no charges, discard it or spend 2 resource to return it to your hand. [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If you fail, remove 1 charge from Trace Scrying.

name: Flickering Memories
text: Investigate. Reduce the cost to play Flickering Memories by 2 or add your [willpower] value - 1 to your skill value for this investigation. If you succeed, you discover 1 additional clue at your location. After this test ends, if Flickering Memories cost 0 resources to play and used your [willpower] value in the skill test, you may shuffle it into your deck.

name: Recreation
text: Choose a card in your hand. Shuffle that card into your deck. Search the top 9 cards of your deck for up to 2 cards that share at least 1 trait with the chosen card, and draw them. Shuffle your deck.

name: Shockwave
text: Fight. Reduce the cost to play Shockwave by 2 or add your [willpower] value - 1 to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed, this attack deals +1 damage (+2 damage instead if the enemy is non-Elite). After this test ends, if Shockwave cost 0 resources to play and used your [willpower] value in the skill test, you may shuffle it into your deck.

name: Old Ideas, New Methods
text:
You get +1 [willpower] during this skill test.

If you succeed and this skill test used your [willpower] in any way: Heal 1 horror.

name: Infuse Strength
text:
Uses (3 Charges).

You may commit cards with [willpower] icons to any of your tests and those [willpower] icons boost your [willpower] value during that test.
[free] During a skill test on an event that does not use your [willpower] in any way, spend 1 charge on Infuse Strength: Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this test. If you succeed, place 1 charge on Infuse Strength.

flavor: "We can't run forever, but we try despite that."
name: Reject Fate
text: Fast. Play only during your turn. Uses (3 charges). Attach to an Ally asset you control (limit 1 per ally). Attached asset gets +2 health. [free] Spend 1 charge and exhaust Reject Fate: Shuffle a card in your hand into your deck. Draw a card. Forced When Reject Fate leaves play, take 2 horror.

name: Disrupt Reality
text: Myriad. Fast. Play only during your turn. Attach to your location or a connecting location. That location is "dimensionally unstable" until Disrupt Reality leaves play. Group limit 3 in play. [free] An investigator at your location moves to a dimensionally unstable location. Discard this card or discard a card to shuffle it into your deck(Can be used from any location).

name: Blessing From Above
text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing.
If multiple chaos tokens were revealed during this skill test, you may return Blessing From Above to your hand after this test ends.

name: Shackles of the Deep
text: Exceptional. While there is only 1 non-Elite enemy engaged with you, they cannot make attacks of opportunity against you. When you move, non-Elite enemies disengage from you first. [action] Fight. This attack uses your [willpower] instead of [combat]. If your [combat] is within 2 skill value of your [willpower] before revealing a chaos token, then you get +4 [willpower] and deal +2 damage for this attack.

name: Wheel of Fortune · X
text: Limit 1 per deck. You have 1 additional arcane slot. [reaction] After a Spell or Ritual asset you control leaves play, exhaust Wheel of Fortune · X: Search the top 3 cards of your deck for a Spell or Ritual card. Draw it or play it (paying it cost).

name: Rending
text: Uses (3 charges). If Rending has no charges, discard it or shuffle it back into your deck. You may spend 2 resource to return it to your hand, instead. [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +2 [willpower] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you fail, remove 1 charge from Rending.

name: Trace Scrying
text: Uses (3 charges). If Trace Scrying has no charges, discard it or shuffle it back into your deck. You may spend 2 resource to return it to your hand, instead. [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect].You get +2 [willpower] for this test. If you succeed you discover 1 additional clue at this location. If you fail, remove 1 charge from Trace Scrying.

name: Hand Wraps
text: Uses (3 grit). You get +1 [combat] during basic fight actions. [reaction] After you defeat an enemy with a basic fight action, spend 1 grit and exhaust Hand Wraps: Choose a level 0 Innate skill in your discard pile. Add the chosen skill to your hand.

name: Lucky Rabbit
text: [free] Discard Lucky Rabbit: Search the top 7 cards of your deck for a Item card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

flavor: "Someones gotta keep this city from falling apart."
name: Maintenance Worker
text: [reaction] At the start of your turn, choose and discard a card from your hand and exhaust Maintenance Worker: Gain 2 resources.

name: Work Boots
text: Limit 1 Footwear per investigator. You get +2 [agility] during evade actions. [reaction] After you evade an enemy, exhaust Work Boots: Take a basic fight action against the evaded enemy.

name: Mysteries of the Forest
text: Investigate. You get +1 [intellect] during this skill test for each Creature card in your control and/or discard. If you succeed and have at least 3 total Creature cards in your control and/or discard, you discover 1 additional clue at your location.

name: Soul Searching
text: Investigate. This investigation uses your skill with the highest base value, instead of [intellect]. Add the value of one of your skills with the lowest base value to your skill value for this test. If you succeed, you may heal 1 damage or 1 horror.

name: Jumpy
text: You can only commit Jumpy during a basic evade action you are performing. If this skill test is successful, put Jumpy into play in your play area. You get +1 [agility]. Forced At the end of the round, if Jumpy is in play, shuffle it into your deck.

name: Nosy
text: You can only commit Nosy during a basic investigate action you are performing. If this skill test is successful, put Nosy into play in your play area. You get +1 [intellect]. Forced At the end of the round, if Nosy is in play, shuffle it into your deck.

name: Touchy
text: You can only commit Touchy during a basic fight action you are performing. If this skill test is successful, put Touchy into play in your play area. You get +1 [combat]. Forced At the end of the round, if Touchy is in play, shuffle it into your deck.

name: Survival Skills
text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing.

While Survival Skills is committed to a skill test, you get +2  to one of your skills ([willpower], [intellect], [combat], or [agility]) that does not have the highest base value.

flavor: "Someones gotta keep this city from falling apart."
name: Maintenance Worker
text: [reaction] At the start of your turn, choose and discard one or more cards from your hand and exhaust Maintenance Worker: Gain 2 resources. If you discarded at least 2 cards, draw a card.

name: Follow Through
text: Fast. Play when you would fail a skill test by 3 or less while performing a basic fight action. Cancel that attack. Take a Fight action on a card you control, against the same enemy. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage.

name: Hand Wrap
text: Uses (4 grit). You get +2 [combat] during basic fight actions. [reaction] After you defeat an enemy with a basic fight action, spend 1 grit and exhaust Hand Wrap: Choose a level 0-1 Innate skill in your discard pile. Add the chosen skill to your hand.

name: Jumpy
text: You can only commit Jumpy during a basic evade action you are performing. If this skill test is successful, put Jumpy into play in your play area. You get +1 [agility] and you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to take a basic evade action. Forced At the end of the round, if Jumpy is in play, shuffle it into your deck.

name: Nosy
text: You can only commit Nosy during a basic investigate action you are performing.If this skill test is successful, put Nosy into play in your play area. You get +1 [intellect] and you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to take a basic investigate action. Forced At the end of the round, if Nosy is in play, shuffle it into your deck.

name: Touchy
text: You can only commit Touchy during a basic fight action you are performing. If this skill test is successful, put Touchy into play in your play area. You get +1 [combat] and you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to take a basic fight action. Forced At the end of the round, if Touchy is in play, shuffle it into your deck.

name: Goal Oriented
text:
This card is also a [seeker] level 0 card.
If this skill test is successful during an investigate, you may move 1 location toward a location with at least 1 clue.

If this skill test is successful during an attack, you may move 1 location toward a location with at least 1 enemy.

name: Shattered Timepiece
text: Exceptional. Uses (2 charges). [reaction] When a Non-Elite enemy would move into your location, exhaust Shattered Timepiece: That enemy enters your location exhausted. Place 1 charge on Shattered Timepiece. [free] Spend 1 charge: Choose an investigator or Non-Elite enemy at your location. Move them to a connecting location.

name: Look to the Stars
text:
This card is also a level 2 ( [survivor] ) card.
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location would fail a skill test after revealing a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] token. (Limit 1 Look to the Stars per test.)

They get +2 to their skill value for that test. Reveal another token. If this skill test fails, return Look to the Stars to your hand.

name: Mask of the Forgotten
text: [reaction] At the start of the round, exhaust Mask of the Forgotten: For the remainder of this round you get -1 [willpower] and can parley enemies at your location as if they had the Humanoid trait.

name: Ring of Desire
text: Choose one of your skills with the lowest base value. Increase the base value of that skill by 1.

name: Calm the Nerves
text:
If there are at least 2 Calm the Nerves in the victory display, reduced the cost of this card by 1.
Test [willpower] (5), add your [intellect] value to your skill value for this test and you get +1 [willpower] for each Calm the Nerves in the victory display (max +3). If you succeed, heal 1 horror from an investigator at your location and add this card to the victory display.

name: Life Experience
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.

You may commit Life Experience to any type of test.
You get +1 [willpower], +1 [intellect], +1 [combat], and +1 [agility] for this skill test. 

If this test is successful, draw 1 card.

name: Circlet of Sealing
text: During the enemy phase, enemies at your location have -1 fight and evade.

name: Essence of Humanity
text:
This card can only be purchased once by 1 investigator per campaign.
When the owner of this card would take trauma, cancel 1 of it and exile Essence of Humanity.

flavor: "I can feel them crawling under my skin!"
name: Delusional Parasitosis
text: Revelation Place Delusional Parasitosis into play in your threat area. Forced At the end of your turn: If there are no other investigators at your location, take 1 damage. Otherwise take 1 horror. [action] [action]: Discard Delusional Parasitosis.

name: Overshadowed
text: Revelation Place Overshadowed into play in your threat area. Forced At the end of your turn: If an enemy was defeated at your location, take 1 damage. Otherwise take 1 horror. [action] [action]: Discard Overshadowed.

name: Sword of the Last Crusader
text: [action] Fight. Add your [willpower] value - 1 to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed and a [eldersign] token was revealed this round, this attack deals an additional +1 damage. Any investigator may choose to use the following effect instead of their [eldersign] token's normal effect: [eldersign]: +1. The owner of this card may take an additional action this round, which can only be used to fight (limit once per round).

flavor: "Everything has a weakness if you look hard enough. It's usually being set on fire."
name: Infuse Element
text: Limit 1 per investigator. Evade. If you succeed, put Infuse Element into play in your play area. You get +1 [willpower]. Forced After you fail a skill test that uses [willpower] in any way: Shuffle Infuse Element into your deck.

name: Hatchet
text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If your last action you performed this turn was a basic fight or evade action, this attack deals +1 damage.

name: Down to Earth
text: [reaction] After you succeed a test for a basic action that you committed at least 1 skill to, exhaust Down to Earth: Search the top 6 cards of your deck of an Innate skill and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: The Final Flame
text: [reaction] After you shuffle at least 1 card from your hand, discard, or play area into your deck: Place 1 resource ( from the token pool ) on this card, as kindling. While The Final Flame has at least 5 kindling on it, reduce cost of events you play by 1.
